text: The human monocytic leukemia cell line THP-1 differentiates into macrophage-like cells when treated with phorbol esters .

In order to determine the cis - acting elements necessary for both basal and phorbol 12-myristate-13 acetate ( PMA ) - enhanced promoter activity , we performed deletion analysis and reporter gene assays .
A PMA responsive element has been identified between -182 bp and -107 bp upstream of the major transcription start site .

Gel mobility shift assays demonstrated that binding of <extra_id_0> Sp1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and AP-2 to the <extra_id_0> LAL <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter is increased by PMA in THP-1 cells .
